errorSummary.title: There is a problem
errorSummary.text: It looks like you haven’t filled anything yet , Please enter the required information.

income.title: Expected retirement income
income.description: If you reached State Pension age before 6 April 2016, you need to claim the basic State Pension instead. If you're over 80, you might also be able to make a claim for the over 80 pension.

estimatedIncome.title: Estimated Retirement Income
estimatedIncome.description: Use this section to combine your different pension pots and see how much income they may give you in retirement.

loans.moreInfo: More information about loan/credit card repayments

buyNowPayLater.moreInfo: More information about buy now pay later schemes

homeContentInsurance.moreInfo: More information about home and contents insurance

lifeFuneralInsurance.moreInfo: More information about life and funeral insurance

personalItems.moreInfo: More information about personal item costs

otherPersonal.moreInfo: More information about other personal care

dob.labelText: What is your date of birth?

retireAge.labelText: I would like to retire at the age of:

moreInfo.moreInfoLink: Why do we need your date of birth and gender?
moreInfo.infoText: To calculate your State Pension age

addPartner.title: Would you like to add someone else?

errors.dob-empty: Enter a valid day, month and year
errors.dob-age-range: Your age must be between 18 and 74.
errors.gender-generic: Please enter your gender to continue.
errors.retire-age-empty: Your retire age can’t be blank
errors.retire-age-range: Your retirement age must be between 55 and 99.

saveAndComeBack.title: Save and come back later
saveAndComeBack.description: Enter your email below and we’ll send you a link to access your saved progress. Use the link to return to your online appointment any time.
saveAndComeBack.emailHint: We’ll only use this to send you a link to access your saved progress.

errors.email-generic: Error: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
errors.email-error: There was a problem sending the email, please try again.

progressSaved.title: Progress saved
progressSaved.subtitle: What happens next
progressSaved.description: We’ve sent you an email. It’ll come from xxxx. Make sure to check your spam folder if you haven’t received it.
progressSaved.description2: Click the link in the email to return to your Budget.
